contentrichtext.text: {{multiple issues| {{notability|date=August 2012}} {{BLP IMDb refimprove|only=yes|date=March 2009}} }} '''Yvette Dotrice''' is an [[England|English]] [[actress]] known for her role as Wendy Crisp during the 25-year run of the [[television]] [[soap opera]] ''[[Crossroads (soap opera)|Crossroads]]''. Dotrice is the daughter of Shakespearean actors [[Roy Dotrice|Roy]] and [[Kay Dotrice]]. Her sisters, [[Karen Dotrice|Karen]] and [[Michele Dotrice|Michele]], also are actresses. ==External links== * {{IMDb name|1531525|Yvette Dotrice}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Dotrice, Yvette | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Actress | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Dotrice, Yvette}} [[Category:English television actresses]] [[Category:English soap opera actresses]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:English film actresses]] [[Category:21st-century English actresses]] [[Category:20th-century English actresses]] {{England-tv-actor-stub}}
